dae.label: Label
dae.Title: Effects
dae.noeffect: Your character does not have an effect name
dae.notTargetItem: This item does not have targets specified
dae.ConsumeCharge.Name: Consume Charge On Passive Activation
dae.ConsumeCharge.Hint: When activating a passive effect via togglePassiveEffect or chat status card only activate if the item has charges and consume a charge
dae.playersCanSeeEffects.Name: Allow players to see details of effects
dae.playersCanSeeEffects.Hint: If off do not show players the item effects tab or detailed effects summary for passive items. TRUSTED Players can edit effects
dae.tokenEffects.Name: Enable Token Effects
dae.tokenEffects.Hint: Allows effects that target a specific token, e.g. invisible, blind (experimental feature)
dae.calculateArmor.Name: Auto Calculate armor class
dae.calculateArmor.Hint: If true dynamic effects will auto calculate AC from armor/shields in the inventory. Other items can still modify AC
dae.applyBaseAC.Name: Auto calc base AC
dae.applyBaseAC.Hint: If set characters (not NPCs) will get their base AC set to 10 + dex.mod
dae.transfer.Name: Transfer to actor on item equip
dae.transfer.Hint: Enabled means the effect is applied to the owner of the item when the item is equppied. Disable if you want the effect to apply to a target when the item is used
dae.useAbilitySave.Name: Use ability save field when rolling ability saves
dae.useAbilitySave.Hint: DND5e default uses only the ability modifier, enabling this option means rolling saves will use the save field and can be modified via DAE
dae.Debug.Name: Amount of debug to show
dae.Debug.Hint: Display more debug to console according to setting none < warning < debug < all
dae.useDAESheet.Name: Use the DAE Active Effect Config Sheet?
dae.useDAESheet.Hint: If false uses the Core ActiveEffectConfig Sheet
dae.confirmDelete.Name: Confirm effect deletions
dae.confirmDelete.Hint: Confirm active effect deletion before deleting
dae.expireRealTime.Name: Expire timed effects in real time
dae.expireRealTime.Hint: If enabled and about-time/times-up are not installed timed effects will expire in real time.
dae.isAttacked: Is Attacked: Expires if the character is attacked
dae.isMoved: Moved: expires when the token is moved
dae.isDamaged: is Damaged: Expires if the character is damaged
dae.ZeroHP: Zero HP: expires if the character reaches 0 HP
dae.isHit: is Hit: Expires if the character is hit by any weapon/spell attack even if the weapon/spell does not deal damage
dae.1Action: 1 Action: Expires on the next action (item roll) of the character
dae.1Attack: 1 Attack: Expires on the next {type} by the character
dae.1Spell: 1 Spell: Expires on the next spell cast (ANY spell) by the character
dae.1Reaction: 1 Reaction: Expires after the attack that triggered the reaction is complete
dae.1Hit: 1 Hit: Expires on the next {type} hit by the character
dae.DamageDealt: DamageDealt: Expires when the character deals damage
dae.turnStart: Turn Start: Expires at the start of the targets's next turn (in combat)
dae.turnStartSource: Turn Start: Expires at the start of the source actor's next turn (in combat)
dae.turnEnd: Turn End: Expires at the end of the targets's next turn (in combat)
dae.turnEndSource: Turn End: Expires at the end of the source actor's next turn (in combat)
dae.startEveryTurn: Start of each turn: Run effect macros at the start of the characters turn
dae.endEveryTurn: End of each turn: Run effect macros at the end of the characters turn
dae.displayTraits.Name: Include active effects in special traits display
dae.displayTraits.Hint: Special traits display includes active effects changes. Entered values are assumed to be to the pre-active effect value
dae.noDupDamageMacro.Name: No Duplicate Damage macros
dae.noDupDamageMacro.Hint: If checked duplicate Damage Macros will be ignored
dae.DisableEffects.Name: Disable all active effect processing
dae.DisableEffects.Hint: If set no active effects will be applied to characters. Useful if you want to change character values that are modified by active effects
dae.HandleEquip.Name: Handle Equip/Unequip item active effects
dae.HandleEquip.Hint: If set DAE will handle equip/unequip enabling/disabling active effects and toggling active will toggle equip/unequip
dae.DAETitleBar.Name: DAE Title Bar
dae.DAETitleBar.Hint: Display DAE effect editor button in Title Bar. (You don't need this anymore - just edit from the effects tab)
dae.DAENoTitleText.Name: Just Icon
dae.DAENoTitleText.Hint: Only display the wrench icon in the Title Bar otherwise icon + DAE
dae.ShowDeprecation.Name: Show Deprecation Errors
dae.ShowInline.Name: Display results of inline rolls
dae.ShowInline.Hint: Effects with an inline roll will display the roll results if set

dae.stackableOptions.none: Effects do not stack by origin
dae.stackableOptions.noneName: Effects do not stack by name
dae.stackableOptions.multi: Stacking effects apply the effect multiple times
dae.stackableOptions.count: each stack increase stack count by 1

dae.SW5EHint: Note For Translators - The following strings are ONLY required for the SW5E system
dae.forceToHud.Name: Force display on token
dae.forceToHud.Hint: If non empty set the icon for the effect will be displayed on the token regardless of duration
dae.DurationExpression: Roll expression in seconds for the effect duration
dae.not-reflected: Item Effect Saved. These changes will not be reflected in the originally transferred Effect.
dae.not-transferred: Item Effect Saved. Setting an owned item's effect to Transfer will not automatically transfer the Effect.
dae.ATLHint: Note for translators these are only required for Active Token Lighting
dae.DAEUntestedSystems.Name: Load DAE for untested game systems
dae.DAEUntestedSystems.Hint: If checked DAE will load for any system not marked compatible. If unchecked DAE will only load for systems marked compatible. Requires reload
dae.SelfTarget.Name: Apply to self when item applies target effects
dae.SelfTarget.Hint: Effect is applied to the user of the item, not the targets if the item is applying effects to targets
dae.SelfTargetAlways.Name: Apply to self when item is rolled
dae.SelfTargetAlways.Hint: Effect is applied to the user of the item, not the targets whenever the item is rolled
